welcome_text: Hello! My name is Ruggery Iury
index_desc: Full-Stack developer, singer-songwriter, music producer, and graphical artist
twitch_desc: My user account on Twitch. Occasionally I stream playing games or programming there.
github_desc: My GitHub account. There, you can find all the source codes of my projects, including this site!
soundcloud_desc: My SoundCloud account. There, you can find original songs, demos, and covers!
ngl_desc: Ask me anything! All questions will be delivered anonymously and might be answered via Stories on my personal Instagram account.
